price: 66. Aadmigu (kan gaalka ahi) wuxuu yidhaahdaa: “Ma markaan dhinto, miyaa la I soo bixin anigoo nool?”
arabic: وَيَقُولُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ أَءِذَا مَا مِتُّ لَسَوۡفَ أُخۡرَجُ حَيًّا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wayaqūlu al-insānu a-idhā mā mittu lasawfa ukh'raju ḥayyan
